items.question: What types of images work best for object removal?
items.answer: Images with clear backgrounds yield the best results, though our AI can effectively handle complex scenes as well. The key is to have high-resolution images with minimal interference.

items.question: How precise is the object removal process?
items.answer: Our AI technology delivers high accuracy, ensuring objects are removed seamlessly while maintaining image quality and background integrity.

items.question: Can I undo changes if I'm not satisfied?
items.answer: Yes! You can easily revert to the original photo at any time, allowing for flexibility in your editing process.

items.question: What file formats do you support?
items.answer: We support JPG, PNG, and WebP formats, ensuring compatibility with most images commonly used.

items.question: Is there a limit to how many images I can process?
items.answer: No, there is no limit! You can upload and edit multiple images as needed.

items.question: Do I need design experience to use this tool?
items.answer: Not at all! The user-friendly interface is designed for everyone, regardless of design skills.

items.question: How long does it take to remove objects from a photo?
items.answer: The process is very quick, usually completed in under a minute depending on the complexity of the image.

items.question: Are there any hidden fees?
items.answer: No hidden fees! We operate on a transparent pay-as-you-go model, where you only pay for the edits you make.

items.question: Can I use the edited images for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes! You own full rights to any images edited through our tool, allowing for commercial usage without additional fees.

items.question: What kind of support is available?
items.answer: We offer extensive support through documentation, tutorials, and a support team ready to assist you with any questions or issues.
